price: 24. Diles (a los idólatras, ¡oh, Muhammad!): «¿Quién os concede sustento del cielo y de la tierra?». Respóndeles: «Al-lah. Y,o bien nosotros (los creyentes) o vosotros, estamosguiados o en un claro extravío».
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوۡ إِيَّاكُمۡ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi quli al-lahu wa-innā aw iyyākum laʿalā hudan aw fī ḍalālin mubīnin
